de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.debug

Class DebugSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.BaseController
      • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.debug.DebugSceneController

  • public class DebugSceneController
extends BaseController
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert

    The DebugSceneController is used within the debug_scenechooser.xml - view. The DebugSceneController allows the user to show every stage (window) of the application - its useful for debugging different scenarios without clicking through the happy path first.
